chefs.name: Gordon Ramsay
chefs.quote: Cooking is about passion, so it may look slightly temperamental in a way that it's too assertive to the naked eye.

chefs.name: Julia Child
chefs.quote: The only real stumbling block is fear of failure. In cooking you've got to have a what-the-hell attitude.

chefs.name: Massimo Bottura
chefs.quote: Cooking is an act of love, a gift, and a way of sharing. It is not just about feeding people, it's about creating connections.

chefs.name: Alice Waters
chefs.quote: Good food is a celebration of life. It's about nourishing your body and your soul, and sharing that with the people around you.
